0.5.name: wordpress/comic-rocket-ad-network-widget
0.5.description:
Placing ads on your webcomic just got super easy!

This plugin is a widget that lets you drop a Comic Rocket ad box into one of your webcomic's sidebars. It handles the HTML so you don't have to deal with coding the changes to your theme.

Not a member of the Comic Rocket ad network yet? It's easy to sign up. Join the Comic Rocket ad network!

Comic Rocket is the best place to find, read, and bookmark online comics. Now we want to help creators earn money!

Is your comic not on Comic Rocket yet? Add it here!

If you have any questions just email andy@com
